contact.cta_description: Let's discuss your next project and see how I can help you achieve your goals.

personalInfo.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
personalInfo.summary: With 10+ years of experience, I have gained expertise in designing, building, and maintaining scalable applications. My skill set includes Java/Spring Boot, Angular and different databases, excelling in microservices, API development, and DevOps practices. I have contributed to diverse industries, delivering high-quality, user-focused solutions that integrate seamlessly with complex systems.

projects.b2b_b2c_apis: B2B and B2C APIs / Official Engie Website
projects.legal_documents_api: Legal documents API / Criminal Record system(CRS)
projects.credit_management: Credit management solution (CMS) / Invoice purchase control system (ECAF) / Industrialisation of project data management

descriptions.lead_engineer_desc: Led the analysis, build and maintenance of several applications, integration with different third-party APIs
descriptions.full_stack_engineer_desc: Building/Updating microservices applications with SAP & SalesForce integration, ensuring all systems are connected and communicating correctly via SOAP/ REST/ Kafka.
descriptions.lead_full_stack_engineer_desc: Led the development of a documents platform integrated with SharePoint, overseeing architecture, implementation, and deployment / Introduce new features and fix performance issues in the CRS
descriptions.weather_developer_desc: Developing REST endpoints and a new intermediate API to collect weather and navigation data from various connected systems, and presenting this data on a supervisory platform to inform end users.
descriptions.election_engineer_desc: Led the upgrade of a legacy application to support new REST endpoints and presenting the result of calculations via a newly created angular application.
descriptions.software_engineer_desc: Analyse & develop new requirements and ensure that all the systems are up and running efficiently
descriptions.credit_engineer_desc: Analyse, modeling, and development of features according to business requirements of different REST endpoints with SAP and Salesforce integration via SOAP services.
